title: France panorama. [No. 72/49]
creator_credit: Gaumont-British Instructional and Societe d'informations Cinematographiques
brief_description: French cinemagazine items including: 1. Motorcycle festival - international get-together. 2. Monuments past and future: Yesterday - the Lyon Station Buffet, recently classified a historical monument; Tomorrow - the major projects of Paris: the Montparnasse tower, the St Cloud auto bridge, the Porte Maillot. 3. Stocking and exports - the art treasure storehouse. 4. An author’s dream - on the threshold of the literary season, authors dream of being published. 5. The Casa Velasquez - annual exhibition of the 1971/72 candidates.
